title: Ancient Greek Level II
description: Continuation of the study of Attic Greek grammar and reading of connected prose of the Classical period.

title: Ancient Greek Level IV
description: Upper intermediate reading course in ancient Greek, designed to consolidate students' knowledge of grammar and syntax, broaden vocabulary, and develop precision and confidence in reading and translation.

title: Greek Directed Reading
description: Directs the reading of students with special interests. Guides students in profitable reading in subjects of their own choice. Permission of instructor required.
